moves.1. e4: This is a long game that I didn't enjoy too much but thats the way it goes.
moves.3... a6 4. Bxc6 dxc6: An example of a swap of that doesn'thappen commonly.
moves.5... Qd4: I got up on him postionally.
moves.6. Nf3 Qxe4+: I captured his pawn to make us level.
moves.7. Qe2 Qxe2+: I went for the queen swap off as it would put him in a weaker position.
moves.11. d3 O-O-O 12. h3 Nd5 13. Nxd5 Rxd5 14: There you go- an undoubtable draw. No-one can argue that either of us blundered at any position.
